title: Downloads has a sticky "save as" folder location for just one website.
content:
The Backstory: As a graphic designer, I save things from the web all the time--stock websites, client downloads, all that jazz. Because I have a ton of clients, I have the "Always Ask You Where to Save Files" option selected, and it usually does a pretty good job of remembering where I want to save stuff.

However, I've encountered a crazy bug in the last month: When I save images--jpegs specifically--from Adobe Stock, it will pop up the "where to save" window, and it will be a certain client's folder. (For clarity, we'll call this Tammy's folder.) I'll navigate to the new location I want to save assets for the current project I'm working on (let's say this is Mike's folder). Then I'll download another jpeg for Mike's folder from Adobe, but it will start me back in Tammy's folder again. This means I have to re-navigate to Mike's folder, every single time I want to save anywhere other than Tammy's folder.

Here's the weird thing: When I save .ai/vector files from Adobe stock, it remembers the last folder I saved an .ai/vector file to. Same for .pngs and other file types. On other stock websites, it will also remember, whether they are jps, zips, svgs--it works fine. It's JUST jpegs (not jpgs) from Adobe Stock.

I've tried clearing cookies, data, resetting the download location, rebooting my computer in between all the changes, and even going into the about:config to try to fix it that way. Short of uninstalling/reinstalling firefox, are there any other solutions I should try?

Thanks!
creator: jamie50

title: Whatsapp Web não conecta quando "nunca memorizar histórico" está ativado
content:
Olá!

Está ocorrendo o seguinte problema:

Após configurar o Firefox para "nunca memorizar o histórico" e reiniciar o navegador, o Whatsapp Web não conecta. A página do Whatsapp Web fica em looping e não conecta, indicando que ocorreu um erro.

Se eu selecionar "memorizar todo o conteúdo" e reiniciar o Firefox, o Whatsapp Web conecta normalmente.

Cheguei a reinstalar o Firefox, mas mesmo assim o erro continua.

Alguém está enfrentando o mesmo problema ou sabe como resolver isso?

Obrigado!! Att
creator: rferrari7

title: Firefox won't open
content:
Hello,

Fireox has opened for me for years, but now it won't open! I get this error message: Secure Connection Failed

<An error occurred during a connection to package.onesearch.org. Peer’s Certificate has been revoked.

Error code: SEC_ERROR_REVOKED_CERTIFICATE 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.>

I can see the package.onesearch.org site trying to open BEFORE Firefox, but I am NOT trying to open it! I never even heard of it! Why would a site open at the same time as Firefox?

How do I delete package.onesearch.org from the opening? It is not in my bookmarks.

Thanks for your help.

Jeff K

title: Visualizzazone Barra dei Segnalibri (e viceversa: rimozione visualizzazione......)
content:
Ragazzi !!! Arrivare a SCRIVERVI questo messaggio é IMPRESA TITANICA !!! La prima cosa che un Supporto dovrebbe fare è FACILITARE LA COMUNICAZIONE pubblicando a caratteri di scatola un indirizzo e-mail o equivalente..... Nello specifico vi segnalo un malfunzionamento nella procedura di visualizzazione e de-visualizzazione della BARRA DEI SEGNALIBRI. Se la barra NON è visualzzata, la sequenza di comandi per visualizzarla NON FUNZIONA. IDEM se E' visualizzata, la sequenza di comandi per eliminarla NON FUNZIONA. Spero che in qualche modo RISPONDERETE a questa mia..... La via piùfacile è la mia r-mail giorgio.gilardoni@libero .it o il fisso 027496180. Grazie e saluti.

title: Help! Lost hundreds of links with new update

It was great, cause you could simply go to the tab and see all of the saved links, by date. It opened up every time Firefox started and I never had an issue. TIA!

content: When typing in the URL search bar I'd like to see ONLY URLs I've visited previously, bookmarks and currently open tabs. title: video still not working on Firefox - already tried all the trivial standard fixes
content:
Hi All!

I need some help to nail down the issue with common issue Firefox browser (v117.0 64-bit) video's not playing on my AMD laptop. On Chrome and Edge browser videos do play perfectly. But on Firefox and curiously also on Opera videos keep and stay loading.

I havetried all the trivial standard procedures: clearing cache, disabling hardware acceleration, incognito browsing, troubleshooting mode, refreshing firefox, clean install for both regular and developer edition (v118.0b4 64-bit). The behaviour is consistent regardless of website or application (youtube, browser based microsoft teams, https://camendesign.com/code/video_for_everybody/test.html and others)

Need to note that the issue has been coming and going over the last couple of years with different versions of Firefox. Also curiously when standard Firefox broke first time I installed the developer edition which worked fine for couple of days and then the videos stopped playing in developer edition too. Then for many months I used chrome to watch youtube. Since automatic updates where turned on for Firefox then at certain point surprisingly videos started to work again (probably some software update fixed the issue) and now it has been broke again for couple of months. Sorry unfortunately I'm unable to list all the version numbers here.

When I first started having the issue at some point I googled a setting in about:config the change of which solved the issue, but I can't find this obscure post anymore anywhere.

Does anybody have a lead here how to troubleshoot this issue? Help is much appreciated.

Thankfully, Priit

title: How to set focus on newtab page and not the url bar
content:
When I open a new tab, i would like the page to be in focus and not the urlbar. This is what i used to have in my mozilla.cfg: ``` // Auto focus new tab content try { 

 Cu.import("resource://gre/modules/Services.jsm");  Cu.import("resource:///modules/BrowserWindowTracker.jsm"); 
 Services.obs.addObserver((event) => {    window = BrowserWindowTracker.getTopWindow();    window.gBrowser.selectedBrowser.focus();  }, "browser-open-newtab-start");

} catch(e) { Cu.reportError(e); } ``` This worked until the last update. What solutions are there?

title: Problema con Extension Firefox FVD 16.2.9
content: Hola, Desde hace bastante tiempo vengo utilizando Flash Video Downloader 16.2.9 (FVD) "artur.dubovoy@gmail.com.xpi" (extension de firefox) para bajar casi cualquier video de internet. Es la mejor extension para firefox para bajar video que he usado, ya que en determinados videos (los que se van bajando a trocitos) los va almacenando temporalmente y al terminar los une en un solo .mp4. Pero desde hace un par de meses, SOLO veo "CONVERT" donde antes ponia "DOWNLOAD". Al dar en "CONVERT" me dice que instale un modulo "FVD_Downloader_Module_1.0.8.msi", pero aun instalandole me sigue apareciendo "CONVERT" y no puedo descargar el video. Necesito saber como volver a poder descargar esos videos que se van descargando a trocitos con extension .M4s como por ejemplo el: https://www.rtve.es/play/videos/lazos-de-sangre/mecano/6940737/ O sea, que vuelva a aparecer "Download" en vez de "Convert" en todos los videos. Muchas gracias.

title: Moving firefox profile: No response / no effect
content:
I’m having trouble moving firefox to a new computer. I copy the files, expecting to see my existing set up with bookmarks, extensions, and passwords, and I get no response, no errors, just completely fresh firefox.

Both systems are on arch linux and both running Firefox 117.0. I completely close both firefox. I copy ~/.mozilla/firefox to an ext4 thumb drive from my old computer. on the new computer, I delete the existing ~/.mozilla/firefox. I copy the files from the thumb drive to /firefox/. I restart firefox. unmodified firefox

I’ve also tried chowing the files. and also chmoding 700 and 755 (advice from old stackoverflow threads) ive tried chowing and chmoding. Each time i restart the whole process for posterity. Still no response

I’m dumbfounded as to why it’s not working, and I don’t even know where to look now

title: EVERY TIME I CLOSE MY BROWSER FIREFOX CLOSES ALL MY TABS
content:

(BECAUSE CCLEANER NEEDS TO CLOSE FIREFOX TO CLEAN COOKIES) AND THEN THAT WAY IS THE ONLY WAY TO HAVE ALL MY TABS BACK. BUT THERE ARE TIMES THAT TABS GET CLOSE SUDDENLY AND I LOOSE ALL MY TABS. 

THIS MEANS THAT THE WAY FIREFOX CLOSES THE TABS IS FAR FROM GOOD, AND THEY CAUSE TO CLOSE ALL TABS, OR THEY JUST HAVE NO IDEA HOW TO DO IT RIGHT.

DO YOU KNOW ANY WAY TO CONTACT MOZILLA OR FIREFOX TO REPORT THE PROBLEM? IT IS A SHAME THAT A BROWSER DOES NOT OFFER FREE TECH SUPPORT- AND I CANNOT EVEN TELL THEM!!
